item.title: Using anaconda's virtual environment with Zsh (defect support)
item.description: # Overview Using Jupyter Notebook of anaconda installed with pyenv with zsh (defect support), following trial and error as a memorandum for using Jupyter Notebook with Zsh Keep. Defect status $ conda info -e can confirm the virtual environment, but cannot activate it with $ conda activate <virtual environment name> #Environment Mac OS Mojave Method 1. Try running the virtual environment $ conda activate <virtual environment name> Error message returned
